paragraphs.name: aebe
paragraphs.text: I do think this is a great idea! We were thinking of doing something similar but we decided against it because we thought it might tie our hands quality-wise. We enjoy the ability to choose between different plot lines.

91cc850ae406.title: As soon as I add you as a writer (if I haven’t already) you can submit any post by following these…

paragraphs.text: As soon as I add you as a writer (if I haven’t already) you can submit any post by following these steps. Your story isn’t for awhile so you should think about submitting some short stories in the meantime! Thanks!

paragraphs.text: Hi Chad and Joshua,
paragraphs.name: 5b06

paragraphs.text: I had a thought. Do you think it would work if writers assigned themselves a specific chapter of a story to write?
For example, say Author A writes chapter 1. Then Author B chooses to write chapter 2. After that’s published, Author C signs up for chapter 3. And Author D…
paragraphs.name: 1bd8

virtuals.subtitle: I had a thought. Do you think it would work if writers assigned themselves a specific chapter of a story to write?

content.subtitle: I had a thought. Do you think it would work if writers assigned themselves a specific chapter of a story to write?

de26c5313688.title: This is an awesome concept. I would love to take a crack at a chapter.

paragraphs.text: This is an awesome concept. I would love to take a crack at a chapter.

9e1ca2dacc4b.title: True, but one of the rules did say you’ll edit heavily if you feel the need to do so.

paragraphs.text: True, but one of the rules did say you’ll edit heavily if you feel the need to do so.
paragraphs.name: 3e20

paragraphs.text: If multiple writers work on the same chapter and only one is chosen, the others might feel like they wasted their time or something.
